text: the country of Georgia might make you
think about huge mountains tasty wine
two black sea and smiling faces I bet
you that luxury hotels don't come to
mind but wait until you hear about this
place
[Music]
[Music]
the newly-opened paragraph hotel sitting
alongside the gorgeous Black Sea was
over a hundred million dollar investment
the seven star hotel features 220 rooms
with magnificent views of the Black Sea
it's one of the most spectacular
properties I've ever seen and full of
surprises as soon as you enter inside
you're greeted by a gigantic tunnel-like
aquarium with shark swimming over your
head and under your feet do step outside
the tunnel and see the waterfall and
jungle entrance area to the amazing 150
meters swimming pool walk downstairs and
relax on the unique black sanded beach
call one of the friendly staff to bring
you their signature cocktail which is
only found here
[Music]
and end the day with a fantastic meal at
one of their many themed restaurants but
it doesn't end there there's a Botanical
Garden waterpark yes yes that was much
better
cinema zoo spa tennis court and bars
perhaps the best part about paragraph
hotel is that it's very affordable in
winter season which is now you can get a
room for under a hundred dollars a night
that could get you a hostel bed for a
weekend in New York City as a full time
traveler and someone who visits 35
countries a year words cannot describe
how amazing it is to spend a few days in
a fantasy world like paragraph I'm drew
pinsky and if you like my travel videos
please click Subscribe and join me as I
plan to visit every country in the world
it's electric it's sexy it's tasty it's
